Bases: object

An embouchure handler for brass instruments

Air pressure -> staff position, line spanner Lip pressure -> circle notehead grey value

Returns voices for a particular stage in a segment

class surge.tools.handlers.PickingHandler.PickingHandler(music_maker=None, picking_force_envelopes=None, picking_position_envelopes=None, string_indices_patterns=None, tremolo_patterns=None, number_of_staff_lines=15)[source]¶

Bases: object

A guitar picking handler.

Picking position -> staff position Picking force -> color String ID -> note head (voice) Direction -> articulation (rhythm voice)

Returns voices for a particular stage in a segment.
